citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
There was an excessive accumulation of fresh and old feces in 6 outdoor enclosures. Buildup of waste material is a
potential source of contamination to the enclosed animals, and is an attractant for pests and insects. Fecal matter and
food waste must be removed from primary enclosures at least daily.
Correct by: 5 January 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
There was an excessive accumulation of fresh and old feces in 6 outdoor enclosures.  Buildup of waste material is a 
potential source of contamination to the enclosed animals, and is an attractant for pests and insects.  Fecal matter and 
food waste must be removed from primary enclosures at least daily. 
Correct by:  5 January 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
